title: 😍 8 Weeks Free 😍 - Rooftop Pool / High Rise Downtown
posting_body: Offering 8 weeks free in this luxury spot.
You're located in a peaceful part of downtown, close to Waterloo park, and the capital.
🏊‍♂️ Rooftop clubhouse with private lounge and sunroom with views of downtown.
Rooftop pool with private cabanas, grilling stations, firepits.
Clubroom with billiards, coffee bar and nore.
🏋️‍♂️ Great gym, indoor golf simulator, wifi work stations and more.
🏎️ Gated parking garage with controlled access.
🛎️ Concierge
❤️ High end finishes throughout the apartment.
8 Weeks Free self-prorated factored into listed price.
Taylor Boykin
